function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inaccurate detection of COVID-19 through chest X-ray or CT image analysis","Impact":"Misdiagnosis, delayed treatment, and potential spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Use multiple diagnostic methods for confirmation, and prioritize clinical symptoms and history","Technologies":"Advanced imaging techniques, AI-assisted diagnosis","People":"Patients, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, regulatory authorities"},{"Description":"Privacy concerns related to contact tracing applications and data exchange","Impact":"Exposure of sensitive personal health information, jeopardizing privacy, and security threats","Mitigation":"Implement strong data encryption, strict access controls, and anonymization of data","Technologies":"Blockchain, data encryption tools, anonymization techniques","People":"General public, healthcare organizations, research institutions","Owner":"Regulatory authorities, organizations developing contact tracing apps"},{"Description":"Cybersecurity risks to healthcare data and COVID-19 research organizations","Impact":"Data breaches, exposure of sensitive vaccine research and healthcare data","Mitigation":"Implement strong cybersecurity measures, regular security audits, and employee training","Technologies":"Firewalls, intrusion detection systems, security training programs","People":"Healthcare organizations, research institutions","Owner":"IT departments, cybersecurity experts"}]}
